posts.post_content:
@ Rhunic\_32  
  
U Mad, Bro?  
  
They banned [Jace, the Mind Sculptor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Jace, the Mind Sculptor) and Stoneforge due to a terrible Standard environment. Whenever cards overdominate, they have to be banned to balance out the game.  
  
Wizards did what they had to do to fix Standard. Sure, rotation is a few months away, but in between now and then, there are still tournaments to be held.

posts.post_content: wow wizards can go to hell. just because people can't beat caw blade they ban a card. if you keep loosing to caw blade then you suck... i got my mystics when they first came out for some fun with a kor deck. when i got more serious i ran naya with vengevines. after alara rotated out i added the full see set of mystics and swords to the deck list. It beat up on caw blade... honestly rotation was just a few months away. wizards go to helllllllllllllllllllllllll..... there were some decks that beat up on caw blade.... boros, the new RDW, a lot of decks with black ruined UW because of the hand control and vengevine decks did work... anyone ever think that its win % was so high because so many people at major tourney's play the deck?

posts.post_content:
Oh hey there, centrepiece of the most hated deck in my play circle.  
  
CAW Blade needs to die. Seriously. And this card along with it.   
  
"Hey guys, lets print a card that searches for equipment and lets you play them for 2!"  
"Sweet, love it!"  
  
few months later...  
  
"Hey guys, I was looking over Scars block, and I noticed that we have a lot of powerful equipments planned. What about that Stoneforge thing we printed in Worldwake?"  
"nah, forget about it. Players are too silly to remember that piece of crap."  
  
Why, Wizards, why would you make a block with powerful equipment after printing something like this?  
  
/rant  
  
EDIT: Wootwoot. Turns out she was good enough to save WoTC finding the banhammer by doing it herself xD
posts.html:
Oh hey there, centrepiece of the most hated deck in my play circle.

CAW Blade needs to die. Seriously. And this card along with it.

"Hey guys, lets print a card that searches for equipment and lets you play them for 2!"
"Sweet, love it!"

few months later...

"Hey guys, I was looking over Scars block, and I noticed that we have a lot of powerful equipments planned. What about that Stoneforge thing we printed in Worldwake?"
"nah, forget about it. Players are too silly to remember that piece of crap."

Why, Wizards, why would you make a block with powerful equipment after printing something like this?

/rant

EDIT: Wootwoot. Turns out she was good enough to save WoTC finding the banhammer by doing it herself xD
